meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Silvio Menzano Molly Adams Marie Braden Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6011.

td.p: Silvio Menzano, a psychologist and university counseling center director from Washington, D.C.
Molly Adams, a radio host and producer from Chicago, Illinois
Marie Braden, a customer service representative from Tempe, Arizona (whose 1-day cash winnings total $24,800)

tr.td: ARCHITECTURE
SINGLE-NAMED SINGERS' LAST NAMES
MAKES SENSE
MUSHROOMS
IN THE CLOSET
NICE "AB"s!

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Marie
Molly
Silvio
MIKHAIL GORBACHEV
FILL IN THE TV TITLE
"NEW" GEOGRAPHY
IT'S HYPHENATED
A NOVEL SUM-UP
FRONTWORDS & BACKWORDS
(Alex: Each correct response will consist of two words--one of them being exactly the reverse of the other one.)
